info.name: Canta Dark for Mastodon
info.description:
This is a flexible theme with a mix of GTK's "Canta Dark" and "Equilux" color schemes, makes columns use 100% of screen width.

And change Mastodon look with just 7 small rules !
info.additionalInfo: V 1.3 Finish styling "Modify Media" (progress bar background) V 1.2 Removed last significant rgba mentions. ALL colors can now simply be changed through altering the variables in :root. The only other thing you may want to alter is the hover effect on Retoot button. To do this, match the "fill:%23xxxxxx" in lines 974 (button.icon-button i.fa-retweet) and 978 (button.icon-button i.fa-retweet:hover) with the color you have specified in :root variables. V 1.1 workaround for most incoherence in settings left column IDs. (Some I still can't figure out !) V 1.0 Finish styling Admin and One column view V.0.9.1 Changed status-card__image behavior V.0.9 Tweaking "Getting started" and "Keyboard shortcuts" columns + several minor changes to footer and some special pages. V.0.8.1 Minor adjustments to accomodate for Mastodon 3.0.1 V.0.8.0 Grey shades are less "greenish" (now based on Equilux GTK theme values) Less contrast between toots types (faved, active, private…) New color variable, getting rid of most hex and RGBA values **V0.7.3 Styled login page **V.0.7.2 Finished styling the "embed" modal. **V.0.7.1 More color tweaking **V.0.7.0 Styled "upload area" and "Mark media as sensitive" **V.0.6.1 Added light orange bottom border to all toots, favs, boosts and new follower notification. **V. 0.6.0 Updated to accommodate with polls styling (both creation and results display) **V. 0.5.2 Added matching background for focused toot **V. 0.5.1 Changed "favorited toot" background color ** V. 0.5 Added video controls colors **Version 0.4 Updated to accommodate for Mastodon 2.7.0 **Version 0.3 Main colors declared as variables. Minor adjustments. Mastodon
